alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 6:19AM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. A period of rain and freezing rain is expected this morning. Black ice formation is a concern due to cold ground temperatures, even in locations where the air temperature is above freezing. * WHERE...Dixie, Elk City, Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass, Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass, and Lolo Pass. * WHEN...From 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ this evening to 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
